member.name: EMRGLSBOUNDEDRECORD
member.summary: The EMRGLSBOUNDEDRECORD structure contains members for an enhanced metafile record generated by OpenGL functions. It contains data for OpenGL functions with information in pixel units that must be scaled when playing the metafile.

member.name: EMRGLSBOUNDEDRECORD.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRGLSBOUNDEDRECORD.rclBounds
member.summary: Bounds of the rectangle, in device coordinates, within which to perform the OpenGL function. For more information, see Remarks.

member.name: EMRGLSBOUNDEDRECORD.Data
member.summary: Array of data representing the OpenGL function to be performed.
